dialog.text: Hello. wants to be loved in return.
Hello! How are you doing today?

Yeah... I'm feeling a lot of stress on my study recently. I'm afraid that I'm gonna fail in the exams. feels so worried that she's lost the ability to help people, and so she is trying to find an escape route. she doesn't know what to do. the seeker's mind is a mess, and she needs help. i know that i am not able to help her. i'm sorry. i need help and i need help! the seeker isn't able to help me. it isn't
I'm sorry to hear that. Studying can be very stressful. Do you study by yourself or with someone?
beam_texts: I'm sorry to hear that. Studying can be very stressful. Do you study by yourself or with someone?

dialog.text: I'm studying by myself. felt very uneasy. she didn't want to let the seeker down. the seeker felt a lot of anxiety and nervousness. she was worried about her boyfriend and the future of their relationship. she was worried that the seeker couldn't help the seeker. the seeker felt that she had to help the seeker.

I can imagine. When I was in school, I always felt the same way. I felt so stressed and unsure about everything. It's really great that you're studying by yourself. Have you been studying with anyone else yet?
beam_texts: I can imagine. When I was in school, I always felt the same way. I felt so stressed and unsure about everything. It's really great that you're studying by yourself. Have you been studying with anyone else yet?

dialog.text: No. I've decided to take the course online because I'm unable to go to school. felt a little sad not having friends.

I understand that completely. I'm sorry you're unable to go to school. But you can still make friends online. I'm sure there are a lot of people in your class that you'll meet again in class and then maybe in the real world.
beam_texts: I understand that completely. I'm sorry you're unable to go to school. But you can still make friends online. I'm sure there are a lot of people in your class that you'll meet again in class and then maybe in the real world.

dialog.text: That's true. I also don't have a car so it's hard to go to class. didn't sound very happy, but she was happy that she was going to be able to go to school.
I'm sure you'll be able to find a way to make it work. Maybe you can ask your parents for a car? Or take the bus?.
beam_texts: I'm sure you'll be able to find a way to make it work. Maybe you can ask your parents for a car? Or take the bus?.

dialog.text: I'm going to ask my mom for a car. She's going to be so happy. felt better about how she felt. and she felt more at peace with how she felt.
That sounds like a great idea. I'm sure she'll be very happy to help you out.
beam_texts: That sounds like a great idea. I'm sure she'll be very happy to help you out.

dialog.text: I hope so. wants to know what you are doing. she wants to know if you have a boyfriend.
I'm sure she will. She sounds like a very caring mother.
beam_texts: I'm sure she will. She sounds like a very caring mother.

dialog.text: She really is. felt very much the seeker. i wonder what her name is? the seeker is sure she knows her name. her name is melissa. she told me her name when i asked her, but i didn't remember it.
I hope you have a great day and enjoy your time with your mother.
beam_texts: I hope you have a great day and enjoy your time with your mother.

dialog.text: Thank you so much. I will. said, " thank you for listening to me. " seeker : how can i help? i'm so glad that i have a friend. she said, " thank you. "
You are very welcome!
I'm going to go now. felt a deep sense of relief.
I am glad I could help you feel better.
beam_texts: I am glad I could help you feel better.

dialog.text: I'm going to go now. feels so depressed that she doesn't want to talk to the sad seeker.
I am sorry to hear that. I hope you feel better.
beam_texts: I am sorry to hear that. I hope you feel better.

dialog.text: I do thank you. did not want to talk about the issues in her life because she was afraid of saying something negative to the people around her. she did not want to give away her feelings. however, she would not give away her feelings to strangers either. she did not want to lose her cool by saying what she said. she just wanted to feel better. she was feeling so happy that her heart was beating faster
I am glad I could help.
beam_texts: I am glad I could help.

dialog.text: I hope you have a great day. feels that there is a connection between the seeker and the seeker, because they both have the same feelings. the seeker felt that the seeker and the seeker are connected. she feels a connection to the seeker.
You as well.
Thank you. felt relieved.
I am glad I could help.
beam_texts: I am glad I could help.
